meanings.definition: The state or quality of being telic.
meanings.sent1: Her telicities were evident in her focused determination to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent2: The telicities of the project were clear from the detailed planning and execution.
meanings.sent3: The telicities of the marathon runner shone through as he sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The telicities of the river flowing towards the ocean mirrored the purposeful journey of life.
meanings.sent5: The telicities of the ant colony working together showcased their unity and common goal.

meanings.definition: The purposeful or goal-oriented nature of an action or process.
meanings.sent1: The telicities of the student studying late into the night were driven by the desire to succeed.
meanings.sent2: In every step of his plan, the telicities of his actions were evident.
meanings.sent3: The telicities of the squirrel gathering nuts for winter showed its determination to prepare.
meanings.sent4: The telicities of the wind guiding the sailboat towards the shore were like a silent captain.
meanings.sent5: The telicities of the seed growing into a tree symbolized the natural progression of life.
